Explanations about Options.-e(M):
use netstat(8)-format for displaying the routing table. -ee will generate a very
 long line with all parameters from the routing table.
Explanations about Options.-n(M):
show numerical addresses instead of trying to determine symbolic host names. This
 is useful if you are trying to determine why the route to your nameserver has
 vanished.
